description: 34 skills - consolidated synergy chains, dynamic context injection, argument hints, PreCompact hook

core.description: prd.json schema and task system - auto-loaded when prd.json exists

code-quality.description: Learned patterns from production - loaded with auto/review/build

auto.description: Autonomous task execution with testing and security. Works through all tasks without stopping.

brainstorm.description: Scans codebase, proposes improvements and features autonomously. Use when unsure what to work on next.

status.description: Shows sprint progress and task status. Use 'progress' (not 'status' - that's a built-in).

sprint.description: Creates or advances sprints in prd.json. Use when starting new work cycles or closing completed sprints.

review.description: Code quality check with adaptive effort scaling. Includes security scanning.

pr-review.description: Comprehensive PR review using specialized agents. Use before creating or merging pull requests.

clean.description: Removes temporary screenshots, old backups, stale handoffs, and auto-active flags. Use when project has accumulated temp files.

test.description: Runs unit and browser tests on latest changes. Use after implementing features or fixing bugs.

ship.description: Pre-deploy checklist with review, security, and test verification.

fix.description: Debugs and fixes issues systematically. Use when something is broken, throwing errors, or behaving unexpectedly.

setup-project.description: Initializes project with prd.json and standard config. Use when starting a new project.

supabase.description: Supabase CLI, Postgres performance, and schema patterns. Use for database operations, queries, RLS, and migrations.

audit.description: Parallel quality audit with 7 specialized agents (Opus) including deploy readiness. Use when assessing app quality or before major releases.

browser-auth.description: Browser testing with agent-browser CLI and auth token injection. Loaded via test skill.

checkpoint.description: Saves context state. Auto-triggered every 3 tasks.

deploy.description: Deploy workflow for Vercel, Supabase, and CI/CD pipelines. Use for deployment and CI/CD setup.

preserve-ui.description: Preserves existing UI structure when modifying components.

quality.description: Enforces type safety, design tokens, and all UI states.

react-patterns.description: React/Next.js best practices and optimization patterns.

verify.description: Verifies work completeness with outcome-focused checks. Use after implementing features to ensure quality.

agent-browser.description: Browser automation CLI for AI agents. 5-6x more token-efficient than Playwright MCP. Use for browser testing and web automation.

design.description: Creates distinctive UI - avoids generic AI aesthetics. Use when designing or refining user interfaces.

security.description: Pre-deploy security audit with vulnerability pattern scanning. Auto-loaded with review, audit, ship.

remotion.description: Best practices for Remotion - video creation in React. Use when working with video compositions, animations, or subtitles.

monitoring.description: Observability patterns for production - logging, error tracking, analytics. Use when setting up monitoring.

update.description: Updates claude-auto-dev to latest. Syncs repo with ~/.claude, removes stale files.

commit.description: Standardized git commit, push, and PR creation workflow.

perf.description: Web performance audit - Core Web Vitals, bundle analysis, Lighthouse patterns.

a11y.description: Accessibility audit and patterns - WCAG 2.1 AA compliance for React apps.

refactor.description: Code refactoring patterns - extract, split, restructure without changing behavior.
